sentences.sentence: And he opened his mouth in blasphemy against God, to blaspheme his name, and his tabernacle, and them that dwell in heaven.
sentences.translation: 兽就开口向神说亵渎的话，亵渎神的名，并他的帐幕，以及那些住在天上的。

sentences.sentence: To blaspheme the earth is now the dreadfulest sin, and to rate the heart of the unknowable higher than the meaning of the earth!
sentences.translation: 现在最可怕的罪过是亵渎大地，将‘不可知’的心置于高于大地的意义的位置！
